traits.name: Sly Retreat
traits.desc: Reaction: When a creature moves adjacent to you, you can move away up to half your speed.

traits.name: Knife
traits.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+1 slashing damage.

traits.name: Bolas
traits.desc: DC 10 Dexterity, ranged 30 ft., one creature. The target falls prone until an action is used to untangle or cut free the target legs.

traits.name: Hamstring
traits.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 slashing damage and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
